fex_3.description: Complete the Buluc's Mansion job on the Very Hard difficulty or above.

pick_30.name: You Can Only Plan to Fail
pick_30.description: Complete The Big Bank job on the Mayhem difficulty or above.

bah_1.name: You Can Run, but Not Hide
bah_1.description: Find and secure the goat in the Firestarter job on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.

gage3_15.name: You Can't Hide
gage3_15.description: Kill 25 enemies shooting through walls or objects using only the R93 sniper rifle. Unlocks the "Wooden Body" for the R93 sniper rifle.

vit_3.name: You Can't Vote Twice
vit_3.description: Complete The White House job on the Very Hard difficulty or above.

friend_1.name: You Cockroaches Wanna Play Rough?
friend_1.description: Complete the Scarface Mansion job on the Mayhem difficulty or above.

trk_gs_2.name: You Goat Away
trk_gs_2.description: Complete the Goat Simulator job on the Very Hard difficulty or above.

axe_49.name: You Goat to be Kidding Me...
axe_49.description: Complete the Goat Simulator job on the Death Sentence difficulty with the One Down mechanic activated.

born_1.name: You Got Your Patch!
born_1.description: Complete The Biker Heist on the Death Wish difficulty or above.

bigbank_8.name: You Owe Me One
bigbank_8.description: In the Big Bank job, start the Big Bank job after having spent all 10 favors in Preplanning. Unlocks the "Retro Foregrip" for the Falcon rifle.

you_shall_not_pass.name: You Shall Not Pass!
you_shall_not_pass.description: In the Overpass escape, don't let the cops set foot on the bridge before you can escape.

corp_3.name: You’ve Got Blackmail
corp_3.description: Complete the Hostile Takeover job on the Very Hard difficulty or above.

bex_6.name: Your Gunfire is Drowning out my Trumpet
bex_6.description: Complete the San Martín Bank job on the Death Wish difficulty or above. Unlocks the "Teotihuacan" variant of the "The Minstrel" Outfit.

trk_ed_1.name: Your Vote Matters!
trk_ed_1.description: Complete the Election Day job on the Hard difficulty or above.

pick_41.name: You've Got a Fast Car
pick_41.description: Complete the Car Shop job on the Mayhem difficulty or above.

run_8.name: Zookeeper
run_8.description: On the Heat Street job, find and steal all animal posters and escape.

trk_uc_3.name: ZYGON
trk_uc_3.description: Complete the Undercover job on the OVERKILL difficulty or above.
